rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 6 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat) and Tropical Storm CRISING

Issued at: 8:00 AM, 18 July 2025(Friday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Quezon, Bataan, Laguna, Rizal, Metro Manila, Cavite, Bulacan, Batangas and Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, San Marcelino, Castillejos, San Antonio, San Narciso, San Felipe).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Pampanga, Nueva Ecija, Tarlac and Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, Candelaria, Iba, Masinloc, Palauig, Santa Cruz) which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 11:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms: As of today, there is no Thunderstorm Advisory Issued.
